citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:48 AM on 5
December 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling, received a message back that no one was
available to conduct an inspection. Discussed updated optimal hours with licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:48 AM on 5 
December 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling, received a message back that no one was 
available to conduct an inspection. Discussed updated optimal hours with licensee. 
 
 
End Section
